name: 楊勝明
objective: 此課程包含以下主題：(1)直流馬達、伺服馬達、及永磁交流馬達的建模、控制系統設計與模擬，(2)馬達速度及位置觀測器設計與模擬，(3)數位控制及驅動器設計與模擬。
schedule:
1. Introduction of Matlab/Simulink, DC Motor model, current control (lab0, lab1)
2. Current control loop tuning, time response, frequency response, and bandwidth (lab2)
3. Velocity and position control loop tuning, alternative position control strategies (lab3)
4. Digital position control with analog current controller (lab4)
5. Digital position and current control with PWM (lab5)
6. Digital control with estimated velocity, motor velocity estimator (lab6)
7. Disturbance torque estimator (continuous) (lab7)
8. Adaptive control for Inertia with disturbance torque estimator (continuous) (lab8)
9. Mid-term exam.
10. Modeling and control of two-mass system, FFT (lab9)
11. IPM-PMSM motor model and V/H control (lab10)
12. PMSM current and velocity control (lab11)
13. Maximum torque per ampere control (lab12)
14. Field weakening control (lab13)
15. Three-phase DC-AC Inverter with SPWM (lab14)
16. Space Voltage Vector PWM (lab15)
17. No class
18. Final exam.
scorePolicy:
Lab: 60% (For each Lab, Completion 40%, Lab. Report 20%)
Mid-term exam: 20%
Final exam: 20%
materials:
1.Control System Design Guide, 3th Editions, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press.
2.Observers in Control Systems, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press.
3.Permanent Magnet Synchronous and Brushless DC Motor Drives, Ramu Krishnan, CRC Press 2010.
4.Control of Electric Machine Drive Systems, Seung-Ki Sul, IEEE Press, 2012.
